messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] RE: shunga fittings
messages.msgSnippet: All, Any shunga fitting would be rather unusual, but I d think that a shunga theme tsuba would be a bit too obvious to wear.  I have to wonder whether even the
messages.messageBody:
All,
Any shunga fitting would be rather unusual, but I'd think that a shunga theme tsuba would be a bit too obvious to wear. I have to wonder whether even the few extant fittings were made for foreign sale rather than use.

Jim





I have a catalog with a giant penis theme set of fittings.........tsuba,
kozuka, menuki etc.... pretty weird. Edo period. Perhaps for a
homosexual samurai ???

otherwise that is pretty much it.

Matt

Onderwerp: [nihonto] shunga fittings


gang,
Haynes catalog #7, page 178-9, Goto and Kaga shunga fittings.

Has anyone ever come across tsuba with shunga theme ?

-M
